description:
## Hands-on
### Task
Given the plain JSON with locations in the provider. Generate triples with class ***sch:Place*** and the data properties ***sch:name***, ***onto:surface***, ***onto:population***, ***geo:lat*** and ***geo:long*** in order to achieve the expected results.
### JSON file content

    [
	    {
		    "name": "Oneonta",
		    "surface": "90.16",
		    "population": "1812",
		    "latitude": "44.9625428",
		    "longitude": "-74.4168577"
		},
		{
		    "name": "Iowa",
		    "surface": "167.2",
		    "population": "133611",
		    "latitude": "29.6862705",
		    "longitude": "-82.319746"
		}, 
		...
	]
solution_template:
<#assign locations=providers("HttpProvider", {"url" : "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/helio-ecosystem/helio-ecosystem/main/resources/mappings-data/ldac/plain_locations.json", "method" : "GET"})>
<#assign jpath=handlers("JsonHandler")>
<#list jpath.filter("$.*",locations) as location>
<http://sample.com/resource/[=jpath.filter("name",location)]> a sch:Place ;
	onto:population [=jpath.filter("population",location)] ;
	onto:surface [=jpath.filter("surface",location)] ;
	geo:lat [=jpath.filter("latitude",location)] ;
	geo:long [=jpath.filter("longitude",location)] ;
	sch:name "[=jpath.filter("name",location)]" .
</#list>
expected_result:
<http://sample.com/resource/Oneonta> a sch:Place ;
	onto:population 1812 ;
	onto:surface 90.16 ;
	geo:lat 44.9625428 ;
	geo:long -74.4168577 ;
	sch:name "Oneonta" .
<http://sample.com/resource/Iowa> a sch:Place ;
	onto:population 133611 ;
	onto:surface 167.2 ;
	geo:lat 29.6862705 ;
	geo:long -82.319746 ;
	sch:name "Iowa" .
<http://sample.com/resource/Alberta> a sch:Place ;
	onto:population 1242 ;
	onto:surface 33.75 ;
	geo:lat 41.0816094 ;
	geo:long -76.4098259 ;
	sch:name "Alberta" .
<http://sample.com/resource/Bock> a sch:Place ;
	onto:population 52657 ;
	onto:surface 73.74 ;
	geo:lat 41.6908535 ;
	geo:long -85.9562663 ;
	sch:name "Bock" .
<http://sample.com/resource/Elmhurst> a sch:Place ;
	onto:population 5199 ;
	onto:surface 13.42 ;
	geo:lat 31.4199205 ;
	geo:long -109.9103821 ;
	sch:name "Elmhurst" .
